The hands and hour markers are silver-colored. The watch has a stainless steel chain bracelet with a fold-over clasp.
The LIMESTONE XI Quartz watch is a stylish and versatile timepiece that can be worn for any occasion. It is perfect for everyday wear, as well as for special events.
This series features a variety of square and rectangular watches with a classic and timeless design.

Here are some of the key features of the LIMESTONE XI Quartz watch:

Quartz movement for accurate timekeeping
Stainless steel case and bracelet
White dial with Roman numerals

                Sophistication and grace are much revered qualities in men, which lend them the power to lead the world. This
                
                 Fastrack Essentials watch
                
                is designed for men who love to wear their elegance on their sleeves. This
                
                 analog timepiece for men
                
                is a great handiwork boasting of a simplistic design and astounding features. A trendy watch, fit for wearing on
                
                 casual occasions
                
                , this Fastrack time wear complements your attire whether you attend the wedding of a co-worker or go out for a drink with friends. This
                
                 battery powered wristwatch
                
                will never let you down when it comes to keeping time; the pace of timekeeping in this magnificent time wear is regulated by
                
                 quartz crystal mechanism
                
                .
                


                 Body and Design
                


                Unique and unorthodox design of this
                
                 Fastrack analog watch
                
                makes it a coveted item worth collecting. The attractive colours gracing the
                
                 round dial
                
                lend this men’s watch an aura of masculinity. The modernist craft and out-of-the-box patterns adorning the dial easily create a niche in the wearer’s heart. Be prepared to charm the members of the opposite sex at a party, courtesy of the
                
                 deep shades of the index hour markers
                
                along the outline of the dial.
                

                The watch case is an exquisite piece of art. Made of aluminium, the watch case shimmers in an ethereal glaze that adds a tinge of glamour to this beautiful
                
                 Fastrack analog watch for men
                
                . Possessing the unique property of resistance to corrosion, the
                
                 aluminium case
                
                ensures the durability of this prized time wear. Also
                
                 durable against wear and tear
                
                , the watch case makes sure that your precious timepiece has a long life span.
                

                To appeal to the masculine sensibilities of the wearer, this Fastrack watch comes endowed with a
                
                 leather strap
                
                . With an interesting and
                
                 colourful stitched pattern
                
                running along its centre, the strap keeps the wristwatch adhered to your hand, without causing any irritation to your skin.
                


                 Functions and Other Features
                


                After successfully winning your heart with its classy looks, this
                
                 Fastrack men’s analog watch
                
                will blow you off your mind courtesy of its efficient functionalities. If you are planning to go for a weekend expedition, this watch will prove to be your perfect companion.
                
                 Water resistant up to a depth of 10 m
                
                , this wonderful timepiece will keep working even if splashed with water while you swim across a stream during your trip. A classic combination of poise and technical finesse, this Fastrack timepiece is a worthy collectible for the modern man.

Elevate your wrist game with this exquisite timepiece that seamlessly merges classic design with modern features.

**Key Features:**

**Elegant Square Dial:** Luxurit's analog watch boasts a distinctive square dial, setting it apart from the ordinary. This unique design exudes confidence and class, making it the perfect accessory for any occasion.

**Premium Stainless Steel Strap:** Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, the strap of this watch not only ensures durability but also delivers exceptional comfort. It's designed to withstand the test of time, making it a long-lasting investment in your style.

**Date Display:** Stay organized and punctual with the convenient date display function. This practical feature ensures you're always on schedule, whether it's a business meeting or a dinner date.

**Quartz Movement:** The watch is powered by precise quartz movement, guaranteeing accurate timekeeping, so you can rely on it for your day-to-day activities.

**Water-Resistant:** Luxurit's watch is water-resistant, offering protection against splashes and brief immersion in water. It's suitable for everyday wear, whether you're at the office or enjoying outdoor adventures.

**Versatile Design:** With its sleek and minimalist design, this watch complements a wide range of outfits. Whether you're dressed in a tailored suit or casual attire, it adds a touch of refinement to your ensemble.

**Durable Build:** Luxurit prides itself on creating timepieces built to last. This watch is constructed with precision and attention to detail, ensuring it remains a staple in your collection for years to come.

**Gift-Worthy Packaging:** Luxurit's Square Dial Stainless Steel Analog Watch with Date Display comes in a stylish and luxurious box, making it an excellent gift for the discerning man in your life.

Elevate your style with Luxurit's Square Dial Stainless Steel Analog Watch with Date Display – a symbol of timeless elegance and functionality. Make a statement, keep track of time effortlessly, and embrace sophistication with every glance at your wrist. Upgrade your watch collection today and experience Luxurit's commitment to quality and style.

                Warranty Period
               

                2 Years
               



                Looking for the perfect watch to sport when you go to work this coming Monday? The kind of watch you wear says a lot about you, especially if you’re in a competitive work environment and looking for that one thing that would give you an edge over all your colleagues.
               

                This is the
                
                 Titan analog sports watch from the Octane series
                
                and it is the perfect accessory to get you noticed for all the right reason, whether you’re at work or out with friends. The men’s watch, with its sporty design, sends just the right message about your personality to the people who have to judge and grade you day in and day out. The
                
                 analog dial
                
                says that you are the kind of person who is conventional and most likely to work hard, while the sporty chronograph and contrast dial says that you know when to kickback and have fun like all the others.
               


                 Body and Design
                


                The
                
                 Titan analog Octane series watch
                
                features a
                
                 fake solid strap
                
                that is extremely comfortable to wear no matter how tiring those long days at the office seems to get. To protect the integral mechanism and movement of the analog watch, the designers from Titan have given the watch a
                
                 brass case
                
                . This case protects the detailed
                
                 round dial
                
                as well, making the watch highly durable against any of the hazards that are usually present in your daily environment.
               


                 Functions and Other Features
                


                The
                
                 men’s Octane series watch from Titan
                
                is equipped to handle moisture and humidity, since the watch is designed to be water resistant. This feature helps keep the watch running in tiptop condition, when you make your way to those humid coastal areas this summer, after you are finally given permission to take that much deserved leave from work. As the watch is designed to be
                
                 water resistant up to a depth of 30 m
                
                , the wristwatch is fully capable of handling those sudden urges you might have to beat the summer heat by paddling through those powerful ocean waves.
               

                The
                
                 Octane series watch for men from Titan
                
                is also equipped with a chronograph. This
                
                 analog chronograph function
                
                is just the feature to help you calculate how long it takes you to get to work during peak hour traffic on a gloomy Monday morning. The
                
                 Titan watch for men
                
                is just the watch to sport when you go out with friends over the weekend as well as when you want to add a touch of sportiness to your office wear during the week.
               


               Manufacturing, Packaging and Import Info
              


              Read More
